metadata.title: How to make Thattil Kutti Dosa or Small Dosa - Rice and Lentil Pancakes
metadata.description: Dosas are South Indian pancakes made with rice and lentils, they are served for breakfast with sambar or chutney. Dosas can be made into thin crepes or into small pancakes.

en: [00:00.000] Dosas are South Indian pancakes made with rice and lentils.
[00:05.200] They are usually served for breakfast with sambar or chutney.
[00:10.800] Dosas can be made thin like crepes or into small pancakes.
[00:16.500] This is called thattil kutti dosa or small dosa.
[00:22.000] The batter is made using rice, lentils and fenugreek seeds.
[00:28.000] The batter should be fermented well before making dosa.
[00:33.500] Heat a cast iron pan over medium high heat.
[00:38.500] Pour a ladle of batter onto the pan.
[00:42.800] For small dosa, do not spread the batter.
[00:47.500] Drizzle ghee over the dosa and let it cook.
[00:52.000] Flip the dosa once it turns golden.
[00:56.000] Serve hot with chutney or sambar.
